content:
关于我 Who am I

欢迎来到我的博客, 我是 A1andNS ,
2018年第一次了解到网络安全，那是一次计算机导论课，为我对网络安全的兴趣种下了种子。2019年暑假开始学习网络安全知识，学习网络安全就像打游戏一样，过关斩将。特别是第一次接触到CTF入门题目，感觉就和游戏闯关一样。

——————

Welcome to my blog, I am A1andNS
I learned about cyberspace security for the first time in 2018, which was a computer introduction class, which planted the seeds for my interest in cyberspace security. In the summer of 2019, I began to learn the knowledge of cyberspace security. Learning network security is like playing games. Especially when I first came into contact with the topic of getting started with CTF, I felt the same as the game.
